about_the_game:
Apartment 606 is a suspenseful horror and management game where survival hinges on more than just evading danger, you must also complete critical tasks to keep your job while managing unexpected challenges. Each night introduces new threats as you balance your work responsibilities with the growing terror around you. Spanning five nights, the game features cinematic sequences and story progression that slowly reveal the mystery behind your situation. The entire game takes place within the apartment, with multiple possible endings based on your choices.

Gameplay Overview:


Computer Mechanics: Don’t Get Fired, Work Every Night!
  • Tasks: To meet your daily quota, you can perform four different tasks on the computer: writing emails, filling out calculation sheets, solving company captchas, and transferring files.
  • Shop: Earn extra money beyond your quota? Spend it on various upgrades to help you survive the night, such as better internet or a UPS battery for your computer.
  • Mail: As a full-time employee, you’ll receive mail each night. Some are helpful, while others are just spam.



Event Mechanics: Keep Your Apartment Safe!
  • Camera System: After certain events, you’ll gain access to a full camera system. However, the cameras are unreliable and often require rebooting.
  • Sound Management: There’s a lot of noise in the apartment, to avoid complaints (or worse), make sure to keep the radio, TV, and other sound devices off.
  • Light Management: Construction in your building frequently causes the fuse box to trip. Keep the lights on, as darkness may invite sinister characters.
  • Locking Feature: There’s a lock on your door and balcony, make sure both are secured before you head to bed.

Key Features:

  • Immersive Survival Horror: Experience the tension and dread of being alone in a dark, mysterious apartment. Each night grows more dangerous as the environment becomes increasingly hostile.
  • Dynamic Night Progression: Over the five nights, the difficulty escalates as new challenges and threats emerge, requiring adaptability and vigilance.
  • Weather Changes: Random weather changes between nights can increase the difficulty.
  • PC-Based Tasks: Over five intense nights, your primary goal is to complete work-related tasks on the computer while managing household checklists—all of which are vital for your safety and survival.
  • Multiple Endings: Your decisions throughout the game lead to different outcomes, adding replay value.
  • Secret Ending: There’s one hidden ending, can you find the clues ?
  • Extra Night: After completing the game, you unlock a challenging sixth night. This 20-minute endurance test grows harder every second. Survive, and you’ll unlock two additional endings.



Can you survive the five nights and uncover the truth behind the looming threat? Or will the false comfort of safety be your undoing?

content_descriptors.notes: Depiction of suicide, self abortion, mild violence and act of aggression/killing.
